title: Fix chatroom page styling: progress bar color, chat input border, and header logo

requirements.summary: Change Header progress bar background color from 'bg-accent' to match the site's blue color used for other inputs
acceptanceCriteria: Progress bar background uses the same blue color as other input fields
Progress bar is clearly visible against the background

file_operations.description: Update the progress bar background color from 'bg-accent' to use the site's primary blue color (bg-blue-500 or the equivalent theme color used for input fields). Locate the progress bar element and change its className from 'bg-accent' to match the blue color scheme used consistently across input elements in the application.

requirements.summary: Remove the unnecessary border from the chat input textarea in MessageInput component
acceptanceCriteria: Chat input textarea has no visible border
Input maintains proper spacing and alignment without the border

file_operations.description: Remove the border styling from the chat input textarea element. Locate the textarea element and remove any border-related classes (e.g., 'border', 'border-*') from its className. Ensure the textarea maintains proper spacing and alignment after the border removal.

requirements.summary: Update Header Chattr logo to use rounded-full background with message-circle icon
acceptanceCriteria: Logo displays as a circular background with primary color
Message circle icon is properly sized (h-6 w-6) and uses primary-foreground text color

file_operations.description: Replace the current Chattr logo implementation with a new design featuring a circular background. Update the logo element to use the following structure: a container div with classes 'flex h-10 w-10 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-primary', containing an SVG message-circle icon (lucide-react MessageCircle or inline SVG) with classes 'h-6 w-6 text-primary-foreground' and attributes width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' aria-hidden='true'. The SVG path should be: 'M7.9 20A9 9 0 1 0 4 16.1L2 22Z'.
